content: 2011 Singaporean film ***Red Dragonflies*** is a Singapore film directed by Liao Jiekai. It was released in Singapore cinemas on 5 May 2011. The film won a special jury prize at the [Jeonju International Film Festival](/wiki/Jeonju_International_Film_Festival) in 2010. ## Plot Three [Junior College](/wiki/Junior_college_(Singapore)) students, Rachel, Tien and Jun begin exploring an abandoned railway track, and an accident happens. Three years later, Rachel and Tien cross paths again. ## Reception Boon Chan of *[The Straits Times](/wiki/The_Straits_Times)* gave the film 2.5 stars out of 5, stating, "The spirit of exploration is alive and well in Red Dragonflies but, unfortunately, this feature debut feels like it may have wandered off the tracks". This article related to a Singaporean film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Red Dragonflies
